channel.title: Spoke on Labs@Sysdeseng
channel.description: Recent content in Spoke on Labs@Sysdeseng

item.title: Using Advanced Cluster Management (ACM)
item.description: Reference Deploy Folder: https://github.com/RHsyseng/labs-index/tree/master/deploy-hub-spoke-over-acm To have a full reference there’s a deploy script inside the deploy folder mentioned before, with all the steps shown here. Create the pull-secret This pull-secret will be injected into the discovery ISO, so it needs to be a valid pull-secret and be able to pull from the registries you’re going to use for the deployment. If you have some doubts you could use the next tool to verify it: pull secret validator

item.title: Using Assisted Installer (AI)
item.description: Reference Deploy Folder: https://github.com/RHsyseng/labs-index/tree/master/deploy-hub-spoke-over-AI To have a full reference there’s a deploy script inside the deploy folder mentioned before, with all the steps shown here. Create the pull-secret This pull-secret will be injected into the discovery ISO, so it needs to be a valid pull-secret and be able to pull from the registries you’re going to use. If you have some doubts you could use the next tool to verify it: pull secret validator
